name: Unus (Ultimate)
description: Unus worked with the Brotherhood of Mutants and with Magneto directly, projecting Magneto's image to allow him to converse with Charles Xavier without a face-to-face meeting.

wiki.powers: Unus was a psychic able to astrally project himself and others.
wiki.bio_text: During the [[Ultimate War]], [[Magneto (Ultimate)|Magneto]] was served by an underling named Unus. Unus worked with the [[Brotherhood of Mutants (Ultimate)|Brotherhood of Mutants]] and with Magneto directly, projecting Magneto's image to allow him to converse with [[Professor X (Ultimate)|Charles Xavier]] without a face-to-face meeting. Unus' current whereabouts are unknown.
